mapper.sql:
from playball.playball_team_players ptp left join playball.playball_users pu on ptp.u_id = pu.u_id left join playball.playball_team pt on ptp.team_id = pt.team_id left join playball.playball_sports_position psp on ptp.tp_position = psp.id WHERE 1=1
and pt.t_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{playerModel.teamName}),'%')
and pu.u_nickName LIKE concat(concat('%',#{playerModel.nickName}),'%')
and psp.text LIKE concat(concat('%',#{playerModel.positionName}),'%')
mapper.select: SELECT ptp.tp_id AS tpId, ptp.u_id AS uid, ptp.tp_joinTime AS tpJointime, ptp.tp_quitTime AS tpQuittime, ptp.team_id AS teamId, ptp.tp_clothes_number AS tpClothesNumber, ptp.tp_position AS tpPosition, ptp.ability_value AS abilityValue, ptp.createTime AS createtime, ptp.updateTime AS updatetime, ptp.is_delete AS isDelete, ptp.version AS version, pu.u_name AS userName, pu.u_nickName AS nickName, pt.t_name AS teamName, psp.text AS positionName, pt.st_id AS sportsId

SELECT ptp.tp_id AS tpId, ptp.u_id AS uid, ptp.tp_joinTime AS tpJointime, ptp.tp_quitTime AS tpQuittime, ptp.team_id AS teamId, ptp.tp_clothes_number AS tpClothesNumber, ptp.tp_position AS tpPosition, ptp.ability_value AS abilityValue, ptp.is_delete AS isDelete, ptp.version AS version, pu.u_name AS userName, pu.u_nickName AS nickName, psp.text AS positionName, psu.data_json AS dataJson FROM playball.playball_team_players ptp LEFT JOIN playball.playball_enroll pe ON pe.team_id = ptp.team_id LEFT JOIN playball.playball_enroll_player pep ON pe.id = pep.enroll_id LEFT JOIN playball.playball_users pu on ptp.u_id = pu.u_id LEFT JOIN playball.playball_sports_position psp on ptp.tp_position = psp.id LEFT JOIN playball.playball_schedule_userdata psu on psu.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} WHERE ptp.tp_id = pep.player_id AND pe.games_id=#{gameId} AND ptp.team_id=#{teamId}
